name: Verify default and changed store pickup options for products in the cart

steps.name: Given guest user is on michaels home page
When a product is added to the cart
Then verify the default store pickup option is displayed in the cart for the product
When the user changes the default store selection
And a second product is added to the cart
steps.statusMessage: Error: No product found with Store Pickup
